main event: A brightly lit rotating object was observed on the Edens Highway between Skokie and Highland Park, Illinois on June 8, 1963.
interesting points: The object was seen by a child and his family., The object was at approximately 2,000 feet altitude., The light was described as elongated and very bright., The sighting lasted for about 5 hours., No motion was observed during the sighting.
sighted object: a very brightly lit rotating object
witness description: an 11-year-old child, his father, and his 15-year-old brother
